name: Nebeyu Daniel

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Associate of Science in Computer Science

relevant_courses: Introduction to Computer Systems (Linux, C, MIPS & x86_64 Assembly)
Web Application Development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, React, NodeJS)

projects.title: Stock Trading Simulator (Flask)
projects.description: Collaborated in a team environment to deploy a Flask-based Stock Trading Simulator that allows users to buy and sell stocks, track their stock portfolios in real time, and view price data, using an API driven data retrieval and MongoDB to save user account information.

projects.title: Philosopical Chat Bot (Flast + Python + LLM)
projects.description: Developed a Flask-based web application that integrates Hugging Face APIs for LLM retrieval, enabling an interactive, back-and-forth philosophical dialogue, featuring conversation memory, topic selection, and dynamic UI updates.

projects.title: Integrated Health/Fitness Application (HTML/CSS/JS)
projects.description: Collaborated with a team to design and implement an HTML/JS/CSS integrated health app, focusing on user-centric interface design and smooth utility for tracking health and exercise goals.

voluntary_education.description: Completed a 15-week career and job skill development seminar and delivered the commencement speech to over 100 people. Continue to work with a mentor to reach education and career goals.

certifications: Google IT Support Certificate (5-course series on Coursera: Technical Support Fundamentals, Networking, Operating Systems, System Administration, IT Security)

experience.title: IT Intern (remote/on-site)
bullets: Designed and implemented a Python tool for generating secure, random passwords, integrating a strength evaluation algorithm aligned with security best practices.
Delivered a technical report through PowerPoint, later used as a training resource, showcasing ability to communicate complex ideas effectively.
Developed robotics and cybersecurity curricula for SecureTech360’s MySecureKid summer camp.
Performed maintenance and troubleshooting on lab computers to ensure stability and functionality.
Communicated project progress proactively, demonstrating initiative and collaboration.
Provided research materials on cybersecurity involvement with Fintech.

experience.title: Server/Trainer
bullets: Delivered excellent customer service by anticipating customer needs and ensuring satisfaction.
Led and mentored staff, collaborating with management to improve restaurant operations.
Fostered a collaborative and trustworthy team environment through effective communication.
